entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
